# Spinalis Cervicis
## Origin
C5-T2 (SP) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

## Insertion 
C2-C5 (SP) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

## Innervation
[Spinal nn. (Posterior Rami)]({{< var ref-spinal-nerves.path >}}) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

## Action

- **BIL**: Extends C/S and T/S @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020
